message.content:
cs.IT, cs.ITP, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.MM

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of approximating a general channel by a general source, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The use of vanishing variational distance as the approximation criteria suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-category of information theory and probability (cs.ITP). The paper's focus on individual properties of sources and channels suggests that it may also be relevant to the sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG). The use of simulation and approximation techniques suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-category of control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper's use of examples suggests that it may also be relevant to the sub-category of multimedia (cs.MM).
